thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Deal Making Just Got Tougher for Struggling Generic Drugmakers

author: Charley Grant
title: Deal Making Just Got Tougher for Struggling Generic Drugmakers
text:
Merger mania has gripped health care. The generic drugs sector might have trouble joining the party.
Generic drugmakers are being squeezed from both sides. Prices are falling because the companies that buy the drugs have consolidated, putting the relatively fragmented drugmakers at a disadvantage. And, the Food and Drug Administration has sped up approvals for new generic drugs, adding new competition to the market.
Mergers...
